page.title: 21Tucktonia No More
page.content:
Since the original Domesday survey Tucktonia closed down and the land was sold.There now stands on the site housing which is a shame for Christchurch as it certainly bought in a lot of visitors especially from Bournemouth.I'm not sure where the model village finished up there were rumours it was going to move to Corby.
Contribution by: Roger Gregory
with Happy Childhood Memories of Ilford and the Pioneer Market
